entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bouctouche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kouchibouguac 09:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -6.9°C
Wind: ENE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle this afternoon. Periods of light snow beginning late this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 4 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:16 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 08:16 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
